name: UploadSymbols
description: Add dSYM files to an existing Raygun application to symbolicate crash reports
author: Ivan Lazarov

inputs.name: symbolsPath
inputs.label: Symbols File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path to one or more dSYM files. A dSYM file is generated when the "Strip Debug Symbols" setting is enabled in the build settings of your project. Minmatch patterns are supported.

inputs.name: appId
inputs.label: App ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The App ID of the Raygun application. To get this ID, either browse to Application settings > dSYM center and copy the last part of the URL path just before /symbols.

inputs.name: externalAccessToken
inputs.label: External Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: You can create this token within your user settings in Raygun, just navigate to (https://app.raygun.io/user) and check the External Access Token section.

messages.NoIpaFilesFound: No symbol files found using pattern: %s
